cause.description:
Objective 1: Safe Water and Sanitation Outcome 1: Rural households have access to adequate all year round supply of water through increase in numbers of sustainable potable water sources.
Objective 2: Disease Reduction Outcome 1: Increased community awareness and understanding of prevention of trachoma, guinea worm and diarrheal diseases.
Objective 3: Water Management Outcome 1: Communities (both genders) mobilized, organized and empowered to own and manage water facilities for sustainability.
Objective 4: Effective Partnership Outcome 1: WAWI HQ and Country teams operational with shared visions well committed to the program.
Please check out www.waterforthepoor.org for more information!
1. Safe Water and Sanitation
2. Disease Reduction
3. Water Management
cause.mission: improve the health and well-being of families and communities in Ghana, Mali and Niger.
cause.name: West Africa Water Initiative
